entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pitt Meadows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pitt Meadows 06:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 4.1°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
